GameConditionDef.label: electromagnetic pulse
GameConditionDef.description: A Nuclear electromagnetic pulse occurs in the area. The electromagnetic interference will prevent most electrical devices from working.
GameConditionDef.letterText:
A Nuclear electromagnetic pulse has occured.

The intense radiation will shut down all electrical devices.

It should pass in about a day.

GameConditionDef.label: nuclear fallout
GameConditionDef.description: A plume of radioactive fallout is slowly settling over this entire region. Any living thing not under a roof will be slowly poisoned, and items left outside will corrode.
GameConditionDef.descriptionFuture: a cloud of toxic fallout will blanket the area around [map_definite] for [gameConditionDuration_duration], killing outdoor plant and animal life
GameConditionDef.endMessage: The worst of the toxic fallout has settled.
GameConditionDef.letterText:
A plume of radioactive fallout is settling over this entire region.

Any person or creature not under a roof will be slowly sickened by the toxic dust settling out of the atmosphere.

It will last for anywhere between a few days to over a quadrum.

GameConditionDef.label: nuclear winter
GameConditionDef.description: A nuclear explosion has occurred and massive quantities of ash have spewed into the atmosphere., significantly reducing the amount of light which reaches the surface. Temperatures will be colder and plants will grow slower.
GameConditionDef.descriptionFuture: a layer of ash will be desposited in the upper atmosphere, reducing sunlight around [map_definite] for [gameConditionDuration_duration], seriously harming the local ecosystem
GameConditionDef.endMessage: Most of the ash has settled.
GameConditionDef.letterText: A nuclear explosion has occurred and massive quantities of ash have spewed into the atmosphere..\n\nAsh in the atmosphere will obscure the sun. Temperatures will drop and plants will suffer for lack of sunlight. It could pass in a few weeks, or it might last many quadrums.

GameConditionDef.label: electromagnetic storm
GameConditionDef.description: A freak localized storm is blasting a small area with repeated lightning strikes.
GameConditionDef.letterText: A freak localized flashstorm is striking a small area with lightning. This can cause massive fires.
